title: Photo altered to show Pope Francis licking baby
subtitle: Reddit posts shared more than 10,000 times show an image of Pope Francis licking a baby’s face. It has been misleadingly altered; according to photo evidence, the pope only kissed the child.
author: factcheck.afp.com
vclaim:
Reddit posts shared more than 10,000 times show an image of Pope Francis licking a baby’s face. It has been misleadingly altered; according to photo evidence, the pope only kissed the child.

The edited image -- which appears here and here on Reddit -- has been circulating since at least 2018.

A Google reverse image search found the original 2013 Associated Press photograph, which was published in The Washington Post. The photo, which showed Francis’ first papal audience on March 27 of that year, can also be found in the AP’s archives.

An AFP photo showing the same moment also makes clear that the pontiff was kissing, not licking, the baby.

In addition to appearing on Reddit, a Spanish-language post on Facebook featuring the image has been shared more than 2,000 times.
